positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description: As a Senior Software Engineer at ECSFin, I am part of the Product and Innovation team, working on developing new products in the banking domain using Spring Boot, Next.js, React.js, Apache Camel, Kafka, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL. With 4+ years of experience in the software industry, I have honed my skills in delivering high-quality software solutions.
achievements: Reduced deployment time by 40% through pipeline optimization
Implemented automated testing framework that improved code quality by 30%
Led migration from legacy systems to modern CI/CD infrastructure

positions.title: Assistant System Engineer
positions.description: I worked on various projects utilizing core Java, Spring Boot, and SQL technologies. I developed and maintained a Rest API project to automate test data management for multiple clients, enhancing the quality and efficiency of software testing.Proficient in DevOps practices, I have experience configuring CI/CD pipelines using Atlassian Bamboo and TFS to ensure fast and reliable software delivery. I am well-versed in Agile methodologies, collaborating with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to deliver value and meet customer needs.
achievements: Developed company's main product website that increased user engagement by 25%
Created reusable component library used across multiple projects
Optimized application performance resulting in 50% faster load times
